column3: School of Electronic, Electrical & Systems Engineering
column5: Our Communications Engineering Masters equips you for a rewarding career in a dynamic field that’s vital to global economic growth. Providing Masters-level specialist knowledge of the principles and advanced applications of communication systems, this programme prepares you perfectly for a career in the industry.The Communications Engineering MSc programme covers a wide range of topics in communication engineering and provides options from outside the core specialism.You will study core modules covering advanced specialist topics, plus cross-programme modules allowing you to specialise in your chosen area, along with an individual research project – which is sometimes undertaken in collaboration with industry.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
